title: 3 & Out - Lamar Locks Up MVP; MLB vs. NFL $; Heisman NFL Hit or Miss; Week 15 Preview; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 & Out - Lamar Locks Up MVP; MLB vs. NFL $; Heisman NFL Hit or Miss; Week 15 Preview; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff thinks Lamar Jackson officially locked up the MVP with ANOTHER 5 TD performance in a TNF win over the Jets, the difference between MLB and NFL money, and the hit or miss NFL crapshoot for Heisman trophy winners. He also previews the full slate of Week 15 games and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
